thread.title: Caitlyn Jenner Will Reportedly Be at Donald Trump’s Inauguration
thread.title_full: Caitlyn Jenner Will Reportedly Be at Donald Trump’s Inauguration

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Caitlyn Jenner Will Reportedly Be at Donald Trump’s Inauguration
text:
Caitlyn Jenner Will Reportedly Be at Donald Trump’s Inauguration by Dana Eisenberg | 6:10 pm, January 11th, 2017 
President-Elect Donald Trump ‘s inauguration is not going to be A-List-less after all. According to Us Weekly , Caitlyn Jenner has accepted an invitation to attend the event, which will take place on January 20th. 
Jenner is a republican, and over the summer she spoke at an LGBT event at the Republican National Convention, saying “I think our best move to get back to a constitutional government is in the Republican party. I won’t give up hope on it.” 
Trump has reportedly had trouble getting celebrities to perform at and attend the inauguration. Back in December, he seemingly refuted those claims when he tweeted that lots of A-Listers wanted to attend, but he wanted “the people.” 
Though most of the Kardashian/Jenner crew supported Hillary Clinton , it’s not entirely surprising Jenner would go- she and Trump seemingly have a good relationship, and while Vice President-Elect Mike Pence has been criticized for his anti-LGBT agenda, Trump seems to be more progressive in that way. He’s said that he doesn’t care which bathroom transgender people use, and Jenner famously used the women’s restroom at Trump Tower. 
[image via Helga Esteb / Shutterstock.com] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
